task_text: [Public Health Policy][Comparative-Analysis] Compare how the WHO and ACP documents approach vaccine equity and access.

gold_end_state.summary: Both WHO and ACP emphasize equity, but WHO focuses on global mechanisms and market dynamics (e.g., COVAX, supply transparency, international coordination), while ACP emphasizes national-level ethical frameworks prioritizing high-risk groups and operational allocation tradeoffs; together they underline both international allocation mechanisms and national prioritization policies.

quiz.question: Which document emphasizes global market mechanisms like COVAX?
Which perspective stresses national prioritization of high-risk groups?

arguments.text: Comparison of WHO and ACP equity approaches
